actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation, Forestry and Environment

official_title: A bill to repeal that paragraph of the Act of March 4, 1913, that designates 10 percent of all National Forest receipts for the construction of roads and trails on the National Forest (37 Stat. 843, as amended; 16 U.S.C. 501).

summary.text: Repeals a provision of Federal law providing that ten percent of National Forest receipts be used for forest road construction.

titles.title: A bill to repeal that paragraph of the Act of March 4, 1913, that designates 10 percent of all National Forest receipts for the construction of roads and trails on the National Forest (37 Stat. 843, as amended; 16 U.S.C. 501).
